《通链参考手册》 ◀▲▶

Type BIT

●Supertypes:

bit, unsigned-byte, signed-byte, integer, rational, real, number, t

●详情:

The type bit is equivalent to the type (integer 0 1) and (unsigned-byte 1).

X3J13设计清单非标准部分，可查下面章节：

  • REAL-NUMBER-TYPE:X3J13-MAR-89
